thread.title: Remember Nicky di Marco from EastEnders? You won’t believe what she looks like now
thread.title_full: Remember Nicky di Marco from EastEnders? You won’t believe what she looks like now

title: Remember Nicky di Marco from EastEnders? You won’t believe what she looks like now
text:
Beppe's little sis Remember Nicky di Marco from EastEnders? You won’t believe what she looks like now 
The actress played the youngest daughter in the popular Italian family on the BBC One soap for two years Revealed Comments SHE WAS the youngest of the di Marco clan who lived on Albert Square during the 1990s. 
Nicky di Marco, played by Carly Hillman, was the best friend of Sonia Jackson, and arrived in the soap with her mother Rosa, sister Teresa, and two protective older brothers Beppe and Gianni. BBC 5 Actress Carly Hillman played Nicky di Marco, the youngest of the di Marco family in Eastenders 
Her most memorable storyline came when her mum arranged for some extra tutoring to help her with her maths homework and she ended up falling for tutor, Rod Morris. 
Nicky made the first move on her tutor but he then took things too far and he sexually assaulted her. 
She was written out of the soap in 2000, and was last seen leaving Albert Square to live in a youth hostel after she realised her family didn’t believe she had been attacked. BBC Nicky with on-screen big brother Beppe. Nicky was the best friend of Sonia Jackson in the soap BBC Her most memorable storyline came when her family wouldn’t believe she had been sexually assaulted by her maths tutor 
But you will never believe what the actress Carly Hillman looks like now. 
In the years since leaving Eastenders, Carly decided to focus on music and joined R&B girlband Urban Lady, who released the track Mutual in 2003. RELATED STORIES EastEnders crisis as Danny Dyer's exit destroys storylines including Whitney Carter's 'pregnancy' PROPA NAWTY GEEZER EastEnders’ bad boy Danny Dyer’s most outrageous moments revealed, from threatening to ‘CHOKE’ Jeremy Kyle to having threesome behind his missus’ back 'If Danny's gone, so am I!' EastEnders fans revolt over Danny Dyer being forced to quit the show and refuse to watch anymore DIAMOND GEEZER Danny Dyer has sensationally QUIT EastEnders - here's all you need to know about him EAST END SURPRISE EastEnders stars surprise June Brown with cake and flowers for her 90th birthday 
Now she works as a professional singer for hire and owns a stage school based in Romford, Essex, called Act One. 
And she still has the long, luscious dark hair that her character was known for. 
Ever wondered what happened to her on-screen sister Teresa, here is what actress Leila Birch looks like now. Twitter Now actress Carly Hillman works as a professional singer and runs her own stage school in Essex Getty Images - FilmMagic In the years after leaving Eastenders, she also joined R&B girlband Urban Lady Danny Dyer, who plays Mick Carter on EastEnders talks to The Sun at the NTAs
